"""
Handle the main controllers for the application.
Creates a container and exports it to the application.
"""
from .register import Register as _Register
from .user import User as _User



[docs]class Controllers:
    """Class to handle the controllers
    Attributes:
        Register (class)
        User (class)
    """

    Register = _Register
    User = _User
